name: Spaghetti Carbonara
instructions: Cook the spaghetti according to package instructions.
Fry pancetta until crispy, then add minced garlic.
Beat eggs with grated Parmesan cheese.
Drain pasta and mix with pancetta and garlic.
Remove from heat, stir in egg mixture quickly.
Season with salt and pepper, then serve.

name: Chicken Teriyaki
instructions: Mix soy sauce, mirin, sake, sugar, and ginger to make teriyaki sauce.
Marinate chicken for 20 minutes.
Pan-fry chicken until browned on both sides.
Pour in remaining marinade and cook until thickened.
Slice and serve with rice or veggies.

name: Caprese Salad
instructions: Slice tomatoes and mozzarella.
Layer alternately on a plate with basil leaves.
Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic glaze.
Season with salt and pepper.

name: Beef Tacos
instructions: Cook ground beef in a skillet until browned.
Add taco seasoning and a bit of water, simmer until thickened.
Warm taco shells.
Fill with beef, lettuce, tomatoes, cheese, and optional toppings.

name: Pancakes
instructions: Mix dry ingredients in one bowl and wet ingredients in another.
Combine both and mix until smooth.
Heat a pan and pour batter in small circles.
Cook until bubbles form, then flip and cook other side.
Serve with maple syrup or fruits.
